item.title: Website Images | Build Hello | We design, code, and fix websites, and minimize how much it costs to develop a website over the span of your five year business plan.
item.description: (function() {var scrollyt=window.requestAnimationFrame||function(callback){window.setTimeout(callback,1000/60)};var elementsToShowy=document.querySelectorAll('#aW9bEZ0SRZDo');function isElementInViewporty(el){if(typeof jQuery==="function"&&el instanceof jQuery){el=el[0]}var rect=el.getBoundingClientRect();return((rect.top=0)||(rect.bottom=(window.innerHeight||document.documentElement.clientHeight)&&rect.top=0&&rect.bottom The Importance of Website Images While videos drive more social media engagement than images, images remain one of the most important aspect of website design and optimization. Images play a key role in creating attraction and conveying brand identity. As a current or future website owner, it's important to carefully consider the images selected for your website.
